dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3170479H] Duplicate Content.
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2007 8:46 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3170479H] Duplicate Content. ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Duplicate Content. Added by system at Wednesday, Feb 21 2007 11:26 am X-MailFrom: gnabeel@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Feb 21 11:26:01 2007 Received: (qmail 15070 invoked by alias); 21 Feb 2007 17:26:01 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 15067 invoked from network); 21 Feb 2007 17:26:01 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 21 Feb 2007 17:26:01 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 21 Feb 2007 11:26:00 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 21 Feb 2007 11:26:00 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from gnabeel@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HJvE8-0004Ve-Fn for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 21 Feb 2007 11:26:00 -0600 Received: from nz-out-0506.google.com ([64.233.162.228]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from gnabeel@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HJvE3-000Lck-2W for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 21 Feb 2007 11:25:55 -0600 Received: by nz-out-0506.google.com with SMTP id f1so2474271nzc for ; Wed, 21 Feb 2007 09:25:52 -0800 (PST) DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=nofws; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:mime-version:content-type; b=gCqNSnS+l1fCWj+uqXo3WgJXgjvMc2FyUsrwdXnS4wGbAa8GhjSMRudzQ6/1Q01nrB064x 5jXj9yeBAhbj8taw3lcHi0rAy7Qd2BgKz+8mbeKmjH95Gr0funpCIelCOq/IRo89QYAlTaow q4NdevMZ7Ng3tOv5rL9yHW6h9lgJQ= Received: by 10.115.61.1 with SMTP id o1mr3879298wak.1172078751614; Wed, 21 Feb 2007 09:25:51 -0800 (PST) Received: by 10.114.107.11 with HTTP; Wed, 21 Feb 2007 09:25:51 -0800 (PST) Message-ID: <908a00750702210925t68f66d8bk7df0ccdd030615d0@mail.gmail.com> Date: Wed, 21 Feb 2007 22:25:51 +0500 From: "Nabeel Khalid" To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: Duplicate Content. MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_10175_7017428.1172078751501" Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 64.233.162.228 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.233.162.228; envelope-from=gnabeel@gmail.com; helo=nz-out-0506.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 21 Feb 2007 17:26:00.0706 (UTC) FILETIME=[5B0CFE20:01C755DD] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Hi, It has come to our attention that the site http://www.insidethesports.com/hosted on your server at IP: 67.18.160.106 have indulged in Copyright Infringement. They have copied many of our complete websites and compiled it into a single website. Examples are Our Website: http://www.tennis-shoes.us/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/1/tennis-shoes.html Our Website: http://www.bridal-shoes.us/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/2/bridal-shoes.html Our Website: http://www.dress-shoes.biz/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/2/dress-shoes.html Our Website: http://www.basketball-shoes.us/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/1/basketball-shoes.html Our Website: http://www.jessicasimpsonshoes.org/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/3/jessica-simpson-shoes.html Our Website: http://www.vans-shoes.us/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/3/vans-shoes.html Our Website: http://www.womens-shoes9.com/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/2/womens-shoes.html Our Website: http://www.girls-shoes.net/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/2/girls-shoes.html This includes over 20 of our websites. We request you to remove either the duplicate content or the website from your server. Thanks, Nabeel Khalid Ovalcom Inc MIME element (text/html) Hi,
It has come to our attention that the site http://www.insidethesports.com/ hosted on your server at IP: 67.18.160.106 have indulged in Copyright Infringement.
They have copied many of our complete websites and compiled it into a single website.
Examples are

Our Website: http://www.tennis-shoes.us/

Our Website: http://www.bridal-shoes.us/

Our Website: http://www.dress-shoes.biz/

Our Website: http://www.basketball-shoes.us/

Our Website: http://www.jessicasimpsonshoes.org/

Our Website: http://www.vans-shoes.us/

Our Website: http://www.womens-shoes9.com/
Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/2/ womens-shoes.html

Our Website: http://www.girls-shoes.net/
Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/2/ girls-shoes.html

This includes over 20 of our websites.

We request you to remove either the duplicate content or the website from your server.

Thanks,
Nabeel Khalid
Ovalcom Inc
